data.persona: I am a teacher from a private school. I sometimes must discipline others. I enjoy grading assignments.
data.description:
You are in the Study room.
A plain room with shelves of religious text are stored.  There are tables and chairs situated around the room available for use.  There are some trunks with books stored.
There's a feather fountain pen, a chair, a shelf, a trunk, a religious text, a book, a candle, a quill, a table, and an ink jar here.
The scribe is here.

You are carrying a quills and a satchel.

data.short_motivation: I want the scribe to ysst the quill
data.mid_motivation: I hope to sell the satchel of quills to the scribe today
data.long_motivation: I hope to survive on the proceeds until school restarts in a few weeks
